modules.sql: WITH visit_totals AS (SELECT bv.branch_id, COUNT(*) AS total_visits FROM branch_visits bv WHERE bv.as_of >= '2024-10-01' GROUP BY bv.branch_id) SELECT vt.branch_id, b.branch_name, vt.total_visits, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY vt.total_visits DESC) AS rank, b.as_of FROM visit_totals vt JOIN branches b ON vt.branch_id = b.branch_id ORDER BY rank, vt.branch_id
